article_title: Kindred Healthcare Hires Scott Blanchette as CIO
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Scott Blanchette, formerly of Vanguard Health Systems, will help Kindred develop its health information exchange.
twitter.title: Kindred Healthcare Hires Scott Blanchette as CIO
